subject: Baseball
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: The Twins have spent much of the last 10 weeks trying to get a deal that would make it palatable to trade Johan Santana, who could wind up in Boston, in the Bronx or in Queens.
snippet: The Twins have spent much of the last 10 weeks trying to get a deal that would make it palatable to trade Johan Santana, who could wind up in Boston, in the Bronx or in Queens.
